alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:47PM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Highest snow accumulations expected north of Route 2 to the New Hampshire and Massachusetts border. * WHERE...Western, Central and interior northeast Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 7 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow overspreads the region from southwest to northeast late Saturday morning through early afternoon. The snow will then change to sleet and/or light freezing rain by late Saturday or Saturday evening from south to north. Precipitation should taper off toward daybreak Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
